task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 4 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Design and implement user data model with required fields for authentication
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create User model with fields: id, email, password_hash, provider, provider_id, created_at, updated_at, email_verified, reset_token, reset_token_expires 2. Add unique constraints on email and provider+provider_id 3. Setup database migrations 4. Add indexes for performance

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-4): Create database schema for users

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Verify user creation, uniqueness constraints, and database operations work correctly
